ScenarioDef.label: Lost Pack
ScenarioDef.description: While in deep-space transit you woke up to alarms ringing everywhere. On the information display in front of you, you could only make out two things "Reactor core meltdown imminent" and "Evacuate via espace pods immediately!". You quickly woke up the other members of your pack and ran to the escape pods. You escaped alive, though the fate of others is not certain.

scenario.summary: Your escape pods land safely on the planet as your ship blows up in orbit.

li.text: While in deep-space transit you woke up to alarms ringing everywhere. On the information display in front of you, you could only make out two things "Reactor core meltdown imminent" and "Evacuate via espace pods immediately!". You quickly woke up the other members of your pack and ran to the escape pods. You escaped alive, though the fate of others is not certain. \nThis planet has unsuitable for Avali atmosphere.\nThe good thing is all spacefaring Avali augmented with basic thermoregulation and life support system so they will not suffocate and boil alive immediately after landing, the bad - this system not designed to work in such harsh for Avali conditions without additional equipment or augments. To survive more than day you colonists must have life support belts or armors with life support system. Minimal summary enviromental protection level must be non less then 15%.
